title: Textile
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, metal
Technique: twill-woven ground with supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: A nineteenth-century velvet in the style of the seventeenth century, the vertically symmetrical pattern shows a large ogive framing a smaller ogive, which in turn contains a floral motif. The pattern is in gold metallic twill on a ground of green velvet pile in various shades, giving a striped effect.
name: Textile
